| HistoryText             = The London community of Morlocks were a group of mutants living in tunnels in London. They were being hunted by [[Mister Clean (Church of Humanity) (Earth-616)|Mister Clean]], and killed.{{citation}}

An explosion destroyed their tunnels, but it is unknown if any survived as they have not been shown since.
